Test Science by God's Word.--Many, when they find themselves incapable of measuring the Creator and His works by their own imperfect knowledge of science, doubt the existence of God and attribute infinite power to nature. These persons have lost the simplicity of faith, and are removed far from God in mind and spirit. There should be a settled faith in the divinity of God's Holy Word. The Bible is not to be tested by men's idea of science, but science is to be brought to the test of this unerring standard. When the Bible makes statements of facts in nature, science may be compared with the  Written Word, and a correct understanding of both will 
                                                                           308
always prove them to be in harmony. One does not contradict the other. All truth, whether in nature or revelation, agrees.
